posts.post_content:
The [Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Onna)-spirits of Kamigawa could be useful with [Semblance Anvil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Semblance Anvil) and [Urza's Incubator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urza's Incubator)  
  
With a couple of cost-reducing cards, you could repeatedly unsummon your opponents' creatures for ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) for each, or do other crazy stuff with the other colors' [Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Onna)s.  
  
2.5/5 for comboness.
posts.html:
The Onna-spirits of Kamigawa could be useful with Semblance Anvil and Urza's Incubator

With a couple of cost-reducing cards, you could repeatedly unsummon your opponents' creatures for for each, or do other crazy stuff with the other colors' Onnas.

2.5/5 for comboness.

posts.post_content:
Two mana over [Man-o'-War](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Man-o'-War).  
  
Splices a sorcery [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon) onto any other Spirit or Arcane spell.  
  
Two of these ladies together = ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) [Capsize for creatures](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disappear).  
  
Not to mention the [Warstorm Surge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Warstorm Surge)/[Spiritcraft](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cloudhoof)/etc potential...
posts.html:
Two mana over Man-o'-War.

Splices a sorcery Unsummon onto any other Spirit or Arcane spell.

Two of these ladies together = Capsize for creatures.

Not to mention the Warstorm Surge/Spiritcraft/etc potential...
Report Abuse  
Posted By: HuntingDrake (6/17/2012 12:57:30 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I agree with everyone that this can't help but draw comparisons to Man O War because of the similar abilities, but being costed 2 more mana makes this card suffer so much. The late game advantage of being able to recast this is nullified because of its 5 mana CC. Such a good card but overly costed and underpowered. If it had flying or 2 more points of toughness..... then maybe but a 2/2 body for 5 is simply overcosted. I really want them to print another Kamigawa block and correct some of the mistakes they made. (crossing fingers)

[Yuki-Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yuki-Onna )   
[Kiri-Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kiri-Onna )   
[Kemuri-Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kemuri-Onna )   
[Nikko-Onna](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nikko-Onna )
